One of the best ways to enjoy music, movies, or games is to use high-quality speakers or headphones. However, what if you don't want to use them all the time or need to move around while using them? This is where SoundWire Server comes in handy. It's a free software application that lets you stream any audio from your Windows PC to your Android or iOS devices. You can use it to listen to music or watch movies without disturbing others or use your phone as a wireless headphone.

## Main Features

SoundWire Server offers several useful features that make it a great choice for anyone who wants to stream audio from their PC to their phone.

### Low Latency

The most important feature of SoundWire Server is its low-latency audio streaming. It uses a proprietary codec that ensures no noticeable delay or lag between the source and destination devices. This means you can enjoy real-time audio playback without any sound delay or lip sync issues.

### Multiple Devices Support

With SoundWire Server, you can stream audio to multiple devices simultaneously. It's a great option for anyone who wants to share their favorite music or movies with others in the same room, without using speakers or turning up the volume.

### Easy Set-up

SoundWire Server is easy to set up and use. You only need to install the software on your PC and download the app on your mobile device. Once you connect them to the same Wi-Fi network, you can start streaming audio with just a few clicks.

### Cross-Platform Support

SoundWire server is compatible with different operating system platforms, such as Windows, Linux, and Android. This means that you can stream audio from your Windows PC to your Android phone, or from your Linux laptop to your iOS tablet.

## Requirements and Installation

Before you install SoundWire Server, ensure that your PC meets the minimum system requirements:

- Windows OS (XP, Vista, 7, 8, and 10)
- 256 MB RAM or higher
- Wi-Fi network connection

To install SoundWire Server, follow these steps:

1. Download the SoundWire Server installer from the official website (https://georgielabs.net/).

2. Run the installer and follow the prompts to complete the installation.

3. Once installed, open the SoundWire Server app on your PC.

4. On your mobile device, go to the Google Play Store or Apple App Store and search for SoundWire.

5. Download and install the SoundWire app.

6. Connect your mobile device to the same Wi-Fi network as your PC.

7. Open the SoundWire app on your mobile device and follow the prompts to connect to the SoundWire Server app on your PC.

8. Once connected, you can start streaming audio from your PC to your mobile device.

## Conclusion

SoundWire Server is a great tool that lets you stream audio from your PC to your mobile devices. Whether you want to listen to music or watch movies, you can enjoy a high-quality audio experience without disturbing others or using bulky speakers or headphones. With its low latency, easy set-up, and cross-platform support, SoundWire Server is a must-try tool for anyone who wants to stream audio wirelessly.
